scripts.build:js: rimraf tmp/app-* dist/*.js.map && cp src/app.js tmp/ && uglifyjs tmp/app.js -o tmp/app-"$APPREV".min.js --source-map dist/app-"$APPREV".min.js.map --source-map-url app-"$APPREV".min.js.map --source-map-root / -m -c --screw-ie8
scripts.postbuild:js: rimraf dist/*.js && rimraf tmp/app.js && concurrently "cp -R tmp/*.js dist/" "mkdir -p dist/libs && cp -R src/*.min.js dist/libs/"
scripts.prebuild: rimraf tmp dist && mkdir -p tmp dist && npm run move:assets
scripts.build: export APPREV=$(date +"%Y%m%d%H%M%S") && concurrently "npm run build:css" "npm run build:js"
scripts.postbuild: mkdir -p tmp/with-resources && node scripts/inject-resources.js && node scripts/inject-fragments.js --source=tmp/with-resources && rimraf tmp/with-resources && l10n-template -t tmp && cp src/redirect.html dist/ && mv dist/redirect.html dist/index.html; exit 0;
scripts.watch: npm run build && concurrently "lite-server dist" "chokidar 'src/*.html' 'src/**/*.html' 'templates/*.html' 'templates/**/*.html' 'l10n/*.json' 'src/**/*.scss' 'src/*.js' -c 'npm run build'"
